topic.title: alert_type
topic.shortdesc: This provides the specific type of alert that is being flagged, e.g. 'don't visit alone'. NOTE: These alert types and associated comments must not be repeated verbatim on an operatives work order for privacy reasons. Only the information that is essential to the performance of the operatives work should be included, which may be abstracted or summarized from the details found in the AlertRegardingPerson entity.
